projects.title: CollabHub
projects.description: Built a dynamic platform empowering students to collaboratively engage in technical projects and explore project concepts with ease. Integrated real-time chat rooms and video conferencing capabilities via Zoom API, enhancing user interaction and collaboration.

projects.title: Discord Bot
projects.description: Developed a Discord Bot delivering daily stock updates based on company names. Implemented comprehensive data visualization using library Chart.js, providing users with intuitive graphs and charts.

projects.title: OLX Clone
projects.description: OLX Clone is an e-commerce website for college students to buy and sell things on campus. On this website, one could sell books/notes and hostel essentials. To build this e-commerce website, I used React.js, Express, and SQL databases as the tech stacks.
